p: It was reported that anti-inflammatory properties of Allium species are due to the presence of effective compounds such as tannin, flavonoids, anthocyanin, saponin, etc. (Aathira et al. 2020). A. cepa contains various flavonoids which can help in treatment of oxidative stress-mediated diseases, as well as inflammation, and thermal and mechanical hyperalgesia associated diseases (Vazhappilly et al. 2019).
